reporter_caption.center: CENTENNIAL BANK v. TRIBUILT CONSTR. GROUP, CA10-1105 (Ark.App. 3-2-2011)

caption.center: CENTENNIAL BANK, Appellant v. TRIBUILT CONSTRUCTION GROUP, Llc, Appellee

opinion.posture: Appeal from Sebastian Circuit, Fort Smith District.
opinion.opinion_text: MOTIONS SUBMITTED Motion of C. Brian Meadors and Amanda Thomas to withdraw as counsel for appellee is denied without prejudice. See Ark. R. Civ. P. 64(b).Page 1
